mapper.select: SELECT pw.WH_NO, pw.PT_NO, p.PT_NAME, pw.WH_PLACENAME, pw.WH_STARTDATE, pw.WH_ENDDATE, pw.WH_DELYN, pw.WH_YN, pw.WH_REJECT, pw.WH_X_COORD, pw.WH_Y_COORD FROM partner_warehouse pw LEFT JOIN partner p ON pw.PT_NO = p.PT_NO ORDER BY pw.WH_X_COORD ASC
mapper.update: update partner_warehouse set wh_reject = #{whReject}, wh_yn = 'N' where wh_no = #{whNo}
update partner_warehouse set wh_yn = 'Y' where wh_no = #{whNo}
